targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  Device AS metric,
  Temperature
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  Device = 'zigbee2mqtt/0x00158d0003f0d65e'
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
